DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether calcium plus vitamin D supplementation conducive weight fat loss energy restriction very-low calcium consumer .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Calcium + Vitamin D Supplementation Weight Management Very-low Calcium Consumers
DOC.detailed_description: Due contradict finding hypothesis calcium supplementation weight fat loss , might explain difference initial calcium intake , present study aim evaluate effect calcium plus vitamin D supplementation accelerate weight fat loss overweight obese subject very-low calcium consumption ( ï¼œ600mg/day ) . The hypothesis test : Calcium plus vitamin D supplementation conducive body weight fat loss overweight obese young adult energy restriction 12 week randomization .
DOC.criteria: Male female 18 25 year age , generally healthy Habitual calcium intake 600mg/d Overweight obese ( BMI 24 35kg/m2 , refer Chinese standard ) Stable body weight ( body weight change le 1kg two month screen ) Less 3 time 20min physical exercise per week Signed write informed consent Coronary heart disease , hypertension , diabetes ; hepatic insufficiency renal insufficiency , hyper hypothyroidism , malabsorption , cholesterol concentration require pharmaceutical treatment Pregnant lactate woman Use calcium supplement , oral antidiabetic agent , antihyperlipidemics medication affect metabolism 30 day randomization Participating another weight loss program ( i.e . take oral pharmacotherapeutic agent and/or herbal preparation intend management obesity ; excessive physical activity ; diet ) On special diet ( i.e . vegetarian ) Presently take recently take prescription drug fluoroquinolone antibiotic , tetracycline , levothyroxine ( thyroid medication ) Participating another clinical trial 6 month randomization Unlikely compliant ( i.e . alcohol , drug abuse ) Refusal inability give inform consent participate study
